node.excerpt: Changes made to New Student Orientation For the last 165 years, MSU has supported and educated students through wars and economic crises, depressions and recessions, epidemics and pandemics. This summer, the COVID-19 pandemic is forcing every university in the country to adapt to new limitations, and part of Michigan State University’s response is to substantially expand New Student Orientation…

node.excerpt: Your guide to MSU virtual commencement By: Michigan State University will hold a virtual commencement celebration on May 16 for all undergraduate and graduate students earning degrees at the end of the 2020 spring semester. The virtual event does not replace an in-person ceremony and members of the class of 2020 will be invited to participate in a future in-person commencement. Here's what you…
